remarks: The group operation of a symmetric group is the function composition. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Feb-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jan-2015.)
statement:
symgplusg.1 $e |- G = ( SymGrp ` A ) $.
symgplusg.2 $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
symgplusg.3 $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
symgplusg $p |- .+ = ( f e. B , g e. B |-> ( f o. g ) ) $.
$d A f g $.
$d B f g $.
$d f g $.
